content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 77.7 - Licensing examinations for physical therapist assistants

State Regulations
(a) The department
may accept passing scores on the National Physical Therapy Examination for

Physical Therapist Assistants or an examination determined to be comparable in
content. Notes
